name: Gift Voucher
description:
Gift our Art to someone Special!

$50 - $100 - $150 - $200

We are all different and sometimes its hard to choose a present for others. That is why we have Gift Vouchers!

We will send a printable voucher for you to give to the receiver and they can decide which one of our Artworks is their favourite!

As we email the voucher to you, when you place the Gift Voucher in the Cart, you need to type the word 'VOUCHER' in the discount area to take the shipping fee away.

name: Lotus Flower Collage
description:
ARTWORK DESCRIPTION
In the East a Lotus flower is a powerful symbol of growth, purification and enlightenment. It miraculously grows from a muddy pond into one of the most beautiful flowers there is, the sun opening up petal by petal with its warmth.

ONE OF A KIND 
This one-of-a-kind collage is created with hand-made papers from Florence in Italy, and Japanese Washi papers. All collages are made individually, one by one, so there will be differences in colour and patterns. 

PRODUCT SPECS
Available sizes: 
Small -  21cm x 21cm 
Medium -  29.7cm x 29.7cm

The base paper is Natural Brown FSC certified 100% recycled.

SHIPPING 
Equivocal offers FREE delivery for orders over $50 within the following Perth City Council areas: Perth CBD, Cambridge, Claremont, Cottesloe, Mosman Park, Nedlands, Stirling, Subiaco, Vincent and Wanneroo. Type in the code 'CHRISTMAS' to activate the discount!

For all other areas in Perth, a flat rate of $9.95 will apply for orders over $50. A flat rate of $6 will apply for orders under $50.

For all other domestic areas in Australia, normal shipping fees will apply.

Equivocal delivers within 1-3 business days.  

Our Art comes from our Minds and is made by our Hands in Australia!

name: The Seven Chakras
description:
ARTWORK DESCRIPTION
Chakra in Sanskrit means ‘turning wheel’.
Essentially the Chakras are centers which connect channels of subtle life force energy called Prana. It is believed that we have seven main Chakra centers and that each main center is connected to our being on several different levels: physical, emotional, mental and spiritual.

Sahasrara ~ Crown ~ Spirituality

Ajna ~ Third Eye ~ Intuition

Vishuddha ~ Throat ~ Expression

Anahata ~ Heart ~ Love

Manipura ~ Solar Plexis ~ Power

Swaditana ~ Sacral ~ Sexuality

Mulhara ~ Root ~ Survival

ONE OF A KIND 
This one-of-a-kind collage is created with hand-made papers from Florence in Italy, and Japanese washi papers. Its final touches are hand drawn by the Artist to give life and meaning to each element. All collages are made individually, one by one, so there will be differences in colour and patterns. 

PRODUCT SPECS
Available sizes: 
-  A4 (29.7cm x 21cm) 
-  A3 (42cm x 29.7cm)

The base paper is Natural Brown FSC certified 100% recycled.

SHIPPING 
Equivocal offers FREE delivery for orders over $50 within the following Perth City Council areas: Perth CBD, Cambridge, Claremont, Cottesloe, Mosman Park, Nedlands, Stirling, Subiaco, Vincent and Wanneroo. Type in the code 'CHRISTMAS' to activate the discount!

For all other areas in Perth, a flat rate of $9.95 will apply for orders over $50.
A flat rate of $6 will apply for orders under $50.

For all other domestic areas in Australia, normal shipping fees will apply.

Equivocal delivers within 1-3 business days.

name: Connected World
description:
ARTWORK DESCRIPTION
The Artists view of the world is often an unconventional one.
This representation of the world map is one of hope and of unity.
Where borders and territories are only present by the natural separation of the land by the oceans and seas. 
Colourful patterns linking each continent together with vividness and lustre.

ONE OF A KIND
Every Artwork is hand painted by our Artist. As a result, each piece will present slight differences in colour from the pictures presented here. We believe this is what makes our work unique.

PRODUCT SPECS
Available in two sizes:
- A3 (42cm x 29.7cm) *
- A2 (59.7cm x 42cm) **

*   Brown or Natural White, FSC 100% Recycled Paper

name: Sitting Birds
description:
ARTWORK DESCRIPTION
I once lived in a tiny little cottage in rural NSW, along a creek, amongst a forest of trees that seemed to be home to hundreds of bird species.
At dawn they would all wake and sing their melodic chants. In the late morning we watched the Willie Wagtail arrive, grooving to the beat of the crickets trilling in the summer heat.
At noon the Cockatoos would blow in with a roar, boisterously bellowing to one another from tree to tree.
Then late afternoon the Swallows would circle, for hours and hours, performing their mesmerising dance until dusk, when they found a safe place to rest until the next day.

ONE OF A KIND
Every Artwork is hand painted by our Artist. As a result, each piece will present slight differences in colour from the pictures presented here. We believe this is what makes our work unique.

PRODUCT SPECS
Available in two sizes:
- A3 (42cm x 29.7cm) *
- A2 (59.7cm x 42cm) **

*   Brown or Natural White, FSC 100% Recycled Paper 
** Brown or Embossed White, FSC 100% Recycled Paper

name: Sumatran Rhino
description:
ARTWORK DESCRIPTION
This guy is the Sumatran (hairy) Rhino. He has been poached and forced out of his habitat to the point where there may actually be a only a handful left in the wild.
A characteristic of the Rhinos behaviour is that he loves to play in the mud. He needs to bath in mud to keep insects away, and for his own mental health. Isn’t that incredible! This act of getting messy in the mud is called ‘Wallowing’.

ONE OF A KIND
Every Artwork is hand painted by our Artist. As a result, each piece will present slight differences in colour from the pictures presented here. We believe this is what makes our work unique.

PRODUCT SPECS

name: Migrating Mother
description:
ARTWORK DESCRIPTION
Whales migrate to warmer waters every year to give their young a safe place to grow.
When their calf is old enough, they make their journey back to the poles to find food.
A miracle of the whale is that carbon dioxide can be extracted from the air by their bodily waste,
playing a role in the reversal of global warming.
So what happens when populations of Whales decrease...?

ONE OF A KIND
Every Artwork is hand painted by our Artist. As a result, each piece will present slight differences in colour from the pictures presented here. We believe this is what makes our work unique.

name: Protecting Tiger
description:
ARTWORK DESCRIPTION
On a trip through Indonesia a few years ago I had the opportunity to visit a Wildlife Zoo, where I encountered quite a few Sumatran Tigers. This one here was sitting by the side of a pond, back facing us, occasionally turning her head around to make sure we were looking it seemed. Sadly the Sumatran Tiger is almost extinct, with an estimated 400 in the wild. In my Illustration, she is with an Umbrella, protecting herself from who?

ONE OF A KIND
Every Artwork is hand painted by our Artist. As a result, each piece will present slight differences in colour from the pictures presented here. We believe this is what makes our work unique.

PRODUCT SPECS

name: Feather Prints
description:
ARTWORK DESCRIPTION
A feather is the miracle of the bird. In his life, a bird has the liberty, even if he doesn't realise, to go wherever he wishes, journey to unseen places, with no boundaries, no laws, just pure freedom. 
Could we ever be like the bird?    

Each one here is hand drawn, inspired by the story of each bird, then digitally transferred into prints.

PRODUCT SPECS
Size available: 
- A3 (42cm x 29.7cm), Natural Brown FSC 100% Recycled Paper

As you can see from the first and second pictures, there are five designs to choose from within this range: Frog & Dragonfly, Three Birds, Guitar Melody, Sailing Sunset and Whispy.

name: The Coy Cutlery
description:
ARTWORK DESCRIPTION
The three musketeers of utensils are the spoon, the fork and the knife. I often see graphic representations of the three in life like forms so I decided to challenge that regular view, and transform the spoon into a fish, the Asian symbol for the wish of luck, good fortune and abundance. 

ONE OF A KIND
Every Artwork is hand painted by our Artist. As a result, each piece will present slight differences in colour from the pictures presented here. We believe this is what makes our work unique.

PRODUCT SPECS

- A3 (42cm x 29.7cm) *
- A2 (59.7cm x 42cm) **

name: Christmas Cards
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
We see things differently at Equivocal! 

You won’t find Christmas trees, snowmen, or the word ‘Merry’ on our cards, but unique messages to remind us to connect to the deeper purpose of this time.

PRODUCT SPECS
The original design is hand drawn, then printed onto Brown, FSC certified 100% Recycled Paper.

Card details: 14cm x 14cm, blank inside. 
Each card comes with hand embossed 100% Recycled Kraft Paper Envelope. 

The set of our Christmas Cards includes five designs: Resting Bird, Four Trees, Sunflower, Playing Elephants, Lotus.

name: Karma Monk Cards
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
Karma is one of the basic teachings of Hindu and Buddhist scriptures. Karma is action.
Karma is the cause and effect of all our actions. Our Actions determine our destiny.
 
“Our life is shaped by our mind; we become what we think.
Suffering follows an evil thought as the wheels of a cart follow the oxen that draws it.
Our life is shaped by our mind; we become what we think.
Joy follows a pure thought like a shadow that never leaves.”
― Gautama Buddha 

PRODUCT SPECS
Every card is hand drawn, then printed onto Brown, FSC certified 100% Recycled Paper.

Card details: 14cm x 14cm, blank inside. 
Each card comes with hand embossed 100% Recycled Kraft Paper Envelope. 

The set of our Karma Monk Cards includes four designs: Watch your Words, Watch your Thoughts, Watch your Actions, Meditate.

SHIPPING 
Equivocal offers FREE delivery for orders over $50 within the following Perth City Council areas: Perth CBD, Cambridge, Claremont, Cottesloe, Mosman Park, Nedlands, Stirling, Subiaco, Vincent and Wanneroo. Type in the code 'CHRISTMAS' to activate the discount!

name: The Circus Girls
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
Life is a Circus.

There are many roles that one must take on to put on the performance.
One needs to be alluring like the Magicians Assistant, daring like the Fire Breather, flexible like the Acrobat, magical like the Magician,  fearless like the Animal Tamer, and skillful like the Juggling Clown. 

PRODUCT SPECS
Every card is hand and digitally drawn, then printed onto Silk White, FSC certified 100% Recycled Paper.

Card details: 14cm x 14cm, blank inside. 
Each card comes with hand embossed 100% Recycled White Paper Envelope. 

The set of our Circus Girl Cards includes six designs: Fire Breather, Animal Tamer, Magician Assistant, Magician, Acrobat, Juggling Clown. 

To see more pictures of the girls take a look at our website!
